p: Additionally, the corticosteroids may induce trans-expression by decreasing gene transcription of various pro-inflammatory cytokines, chemokines, and adhesion molecules [ 5]. Moreover, experimental studies revealed a reduced inflammatory response after the administration of corticosteroid in severe community-acquired pneumonia [ 6]. In this context, the anti-inflammatory effect of the dexamethasone is suggested to probably counter the cytokine storm caused by SARS-CoV-2 infection safeguarding the lungs and subsequently lives, for which detailed investigations are needed.
